name: Barbell Bench Press
description: A compound horizontal press that builds the chest while also training shoulders and triceps.
how_to: Lie on a flat bench with eyes under the bar, feet planted.
Grip slightly wider than shoulder-width, retract scapula and arch slightly.
Unrack, lower bar to mid-chest with forearms vertical.
Press up by driving feet into floor and extending elbows; do not flare excessively.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
description: Targets the upper chest with a pressing pattern on an incline bench.
how_to: Set bench ~30 degrees; plant feet and retract scapula.
Start with dumbbells over chest, palms forward.
Lower to upper chest with elbows ~45° from torso.
Press up while keeping shoulder blades pinned to bench.

name: Push-Up
description: A bodyweight horizontal press and anti-extension core exercise.
how_to: Set up in a high plank: hands under shoulders, body in straight line.
Screw hands into floor to create shoulder stability.
Lower chest between hands, elbows ~30–45° from torso.
Press back to start without letting hips sag.

name: Cable Chest Fly
description: Isolation movement emphasizing horizontal adduction of the chest.
how_to: Set pulleys slightly above shoulder height; take staggered stance.
With slight elbow bend, bring handles together in an arc.
Squeeze pecs, then return with control to a deep stretch.
Avoid shrugging or bending arms excessively.

name: Conventional Deadlift
description: A hip-dominant pull that trains the entire posterior chain and grip.
how_to: Set midfoot under bar, hands just outside knees.
Brace, flatten back, pull slack from the bar.
Push floor away and extend hips and knees together.
Lock out with hips through, then return bar close to body.

name: Barbell Bent-Over Row
description: A horizontal pull to build back thickness and scapular retractors.
how_to: Hinge at hips to ~45°, neutral spine, overhand grip shoulder-width.
Row bar to lower chest/upper abdomen by driving elbows back.
Pause briefly, then lower with control without losing back angle.
Keep torso still; avoid jerking or shrugging.

name: Pull-Up
description: A vertical pull for upper-back and arm strength; scalable with assistance.
how_to: Grip bar slightly wider than shoulder-width; hang with active shoulders.
Pull elbows down toward ribs to bring chest to bar.
Avoid excessive swinging; keep ribs down and legs together.
Lower fully to a dead hang under control.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: Machine-based vertical pull that mimics the pull-up in a seated position.
how_to: Set thigh pad snug; grip bar wider than shoulder-width.
Lean back slightly from hips; chest up.
Pull bar to upper chest by driving elbows down and back.
Control the return; avoid pulling behind the neck.

name: Overhead Barbell Press
description: A vertical press that builds shoulders and triceps while challenging trunk stability.
how_to: Set hands just outside shoulder-width, wrists stacked over elbows.
Brace glutes and core; press bar overhead in a slight arc.
Move head through at top; keep ribs down.
Lower to collarbone with control.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
description: Isolation movement emphasizing shoulder abduction to widen the delts.
how_to: Stand tall, slight hinge, dumbbells at sides with soft elbows.
Raise arms out to ~30–70° leading with elbows.
Pause briefly; lower slowly while keeping tension.
Avoid swinging or shrugging.

name: Face Pull
description: Posterior-shoulder and scapular stability exercise that reinforces external rotation.
how_to: Set rope at upper chest/face height; grab with thumbs back.
Pull rope toward face while externally rotating.
Squeeze shoulder blades; keep elbows below shoulder line.
Return with control; avoid shrugging or lumbar extension.

name: Back Squat
description: A knee- and hip-dominant lower body lift for strength and muscle.
how_to: Set bar across mid traps; grip just outside shoulders; brace.
Sit back and down, tracking knees over toes; keep torso rigid.
Descend to at least parallel while maintaining neutral spine.
Drive up by pushing midfoot into floor and extending hips/knees.

name: Front Squat
description: Upright squat variation emphasizing quads and thoracic extension.
how_to: Rack bar in front rack with elbows high.
Descend with knees tracking over toes; torso upright.
Keep elbows high throughout.
Drive up maintaining midfoot balance.

name: Romanian Deadlift (RDL)
description: A hip-hinge variation focused on eccentric hamstring loading.
how_to: Stand tall with bar/dumbbells; brace and set lats.
Push hips back, keeping bar close and shins near-vertical.
Lower until hamstrings stretch; keep spine neutral.
Drive hips forward to stand without hyperextending.

name: Walking Lunge
description: Alternating forward lunge pattern that improves unilateral strength and balance.
how_to: Step forward and descend until both knees ~90°.
Keep torso tall and hips square; light touch of back knee.
Drive through front foot to stand and step through.
Avoid collapsing inward at the knee.

name: Seated Leg Press
description: Machine-based compound movement to load the legs safely in a fixed path.
how_to: Set seat so knees are ~90° at start; feet mid-sled, hip-width.
Brace and unlock safeties; press through midfoot without locking knees.
Lower sled under control until thighs approach 90° again.
Keep hips down; avoid pelvis lift.

name: Barbell Biceps Curl
description: Classic elbow-flexion exercise to build the biceps.
how_to: Stand tall, supinated grip shoulder-width, elbows by sides.
Curl bar by flexing elbows without swinging torso.
Squeeze at top; lower slowly maintaining tension.
Keep wrists neutral; avoid shrugging.

name: Triceps Pushdown (Cable)
description: Cable isolation exercise emphasizing elbow extension.
how_to: Set elbows pinned to sides; neutral posture.
Extend elbows down until arms straight without locking hard.
Control the return keeping upper arms stationary.
Avoid flaring elbows or leaning excessively.

name: Lying Triceps Extension (Skullcrusher)
description: Horizontal elbow-extension move that heavily loads the triceps long head.
how_to: Lie on bench with arms extended above chest, elbows stacked.
Lower implement by bending elbows, keeping upper arms still.
Stop above forehead or behind head for more stretch.
Extend elbows to return without letting them flare.

name: Parallel Bar Dip
description: Bodyweight pressing movement targeting chest and triceps; lean forward for chest bias.
how_to: Support yourself on bars; shoulders depressed and scapula set.
Descend by bending elbows to ~90° with slight torso lean.
Drive up by extending elbows; avoid anterior shoulder glide.
Use assistance/banding if needed to maintain form.

name: Forearm Plank
description: Anti-extension core hold that trains trunk stiffness and endurance.
how_to: Set forearms under shoulders; legs straight, toes tucked.
Brace abs and glutes; maintain neutral spine and packed neck.
Hold without hip sag or pike; breathe through the brace.
Stop when form breaks.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
description: Dynamic core exercise emphasizing anterior core control and hip flexion.
how_to: Hang with active shoulders; posteriorly tilt pelvis.
Raise straight or bent legs by curling pelvis up.
Pause; lower slowly without swinging.
Use straps or regressions if grip limits you.

name: Cable Wood Chop (High to Low)
description: Rotational pattern training anti-rotation and diagonal force transfer.
how_to: Stand perpendicular to cable; set handle high.
With arms slightly bent, pull across body from high to low.
Rotate through torso and hips; keep ribs down.
Return under control; repeat other side.

name: Ab Wheel Rollout (Kneeling)
description: Advanced anti-extension rollout requiring strong core bracing.
how_to: Kneel with wheel under shoulders; posteriorly tilt pelvis.
Roll forward by extending hips and shoulders together.
Stop before low-back extension; pull back using abs.
Progress distance over time.

name: Barbell Back Squat
description: Lower-body knee/hip-dominant strength lift emphasizing quads and glutes.
how_to: Set stance shoulder-width with toes slightly out.
Brace and descend by bending hips and knees together.
Reach desired depth while maintaining neutral spine.
Drive through midfoot to stand tall.

name: Barbell Front Squat
description: Lower-body knee/hip-dominant strength lift emphasizing quads and glutes.
how_to: Set stance shoulder-width with toes slightly out.
Brace and descend by bending hips and knees together.
Reach desired depth while maintaining neutral spine.
Drive through midfoot to stand tall.

name: Barbell Zercher Squat
description: Lower-body knee/hip-dominant strength lift emphasizing quads and glutes.
how_to: Set stance shoulder-width with toes slightly out.
Brace and descend by bending hips and knees together.
Reach desired depth while maintaining neutral spine.
Drive through midfoot to stand tall.

name: Barbell Deficit Hinge
description: Hip-dominant posterior-chain movement emphasizing hamstrings and glutes.
how_to: Set feet hip-width; soften knees and brace.
Push hips back keeping spine neutral and lats tight.
Lower until hamstrings are taut while keeping shins vertical.
Drive hips forward to stand without hyperextending.

name: Barbell Snatch-Grip Hinge
description: Hip-dominant posterior-chain movement emphasizing hamstrings and glutes.
how_to: Set feet hip-width; soften knees and brace.

name: Barbell Close-Grip Horizontal Press
description: Upper-body press emphasizing chest with triceps and shoulders assisting.
how_to: Set scapulae retracted and feet planted.
Lower implement under control with elbows ~45°.
Press back to lockout without flaring excessively.
Keep ribcage stacked over pelvis.

how_to: Grip just outside shoulder-width; brace glutes and core.

how_to: Hinge or set chest-supported position with neutral spine.

name: Barbell Single-Leg Lunge
description: Unilateral knee/hip pattern improving balance, strength, and mobility.
how_to: Step to chosen stance keeping hips square.
Descend until both knees ~90° with front knee tracking toes.
Drive through front foot to stand, maintaining balance.
Repeat on the other side or step through for reps.

description: Loaded carry training trunk stiffness, grip, and gait mechanics.
how_to: Pick weight safely and stand tall with ribs down.
Walk under control without sway; short quick steps.
Keep shoulders packed; avoid leaning.
Set weight down safely at end of distance.

how_to: Set athletic stance with soft knees and braced core.

name: Barbell Pallof Press

how_to: Stand perpendicular to resistance with hands on handle.

name: Barbell Dead Bug
description: Resist lumbar extension to build anterior core endurance.
how_to: Posteriorly tilt pelvis and set ribs down.
Reach arms overhead or extend body forward under control.
Maintain neutral spine without low-back sag.
Return without breaking the brace.

name: Barbell Hollow Hold

how_to: Set scapulae retracted and feet planted.
Lower implement under control with elbows ~45°.
Press back to lockout without flaring excessively.
Keep ribcage stacked over pelvis.

name: Dumbbell Seated Vertical Press
description: Overhead press pattern building deltoids and triceps while challenging the core.
how_to: Grip just outside shoulder-width; brace glutes and core.
Press overhead moving head through at the top.
Avoid rib flare; keep glutes tight.
Lower with control to start position.

name: Dumbbell Standing Vertical Press
description: Overhead press pattern building deltoids and triceps while challenging the core.
how_to: Grip just outside shoulder-width; brace glutes and core.
Press overhead moving head through at the top.
Avoid rib flare; keep glutes tight.
Lower with control to start position.

name: Dumbbell Single-Arm Horizontal Pull
description: Rowing pattern building back thickness and scapular control.
how_to: Hinge or set chest-supported position with neutral spine.
Drive elbows back to pull implement toward torso.
Squeeze shoulder blades, then lower with control.
Keep torso stable—avoid shrugging or momentum.

name: Dumbbell Single-Leg Lunge
description: Unilateral knee/hip pattern improving balance, strength, and mobility.
how_to: Step to chosen stance keeping hips square.
Descend until both knees ~90° with front knee tracking toes.
Drive through front foot to stand, maintaining balance.
Repeat on the other side or step through for reps.

Initiate rotation through hips and torso together.
Control end range; avoid lumbar hyperextension.

name: Dumbbell Pallof Press
description: Resist rotation to train core stability and force transfer.
how_to: Stand perpendicular to resistance with hands on handle.
Press arms out and resist trunk rotation.
Hold/breathe for prescribed time or reps.
Keep pelvis level and ribs stacked.

name: Dumbbell Dead Bug
description: Resist lumbar extension to build anterior core endurance.
how_to: Posteriorly tilt pelvis and set ribs down.
Reach arms overhead or extend body forward under control.
Maintain neutral spine without low-back sag.
Return without breaking the brace.

name: Dumbbell Hollow Hold
description: Resist lumbar extension to build anterior core endurance.

Maintain straight knees unless variation dictates.

Press overhead moving head through at the top.
Avoid rib flare; keep glutes tight.
Lower with control to start position.

name: Kettlebell Kickback Horizontal Press
description: Upper-body press emphasizing chest with triceps and shoulders assisting.

Lower implement under control with elbows ~45°.
Press back to lockout without flaring excessively.
Keep ribcage stacked over pelvis.

name: Kettlebell Farmer Carry Carry
description: Loaded carry training trunk stiffness, grip, and gait mechanics.
how_to: Pick weight safely and stand tall with ribs down.
Walk under control without sway; short quick steps.
Keep shoulders packed; avoid leaning.
Set weight down safely at end of distance.

name: Kettlebell Dead Bug
description: Resist lumbar extension to build anterior core endurance.
how_to: Posteriorly tilt pelvis and set ribs down.
Reach arms overhead or extend body forward under control.
Maintain neutral spine without low-back sag.
Return without breaking the brace.

name: Kettlebell Hollow Hold
description: Resist lumbar extension to build anterior core endurance.

how_to: Grip just outside shoulder-width; brace glutes and core.
Press overhead moving head through at the top.
Avoid rib flare; keep glutes tight.
Lower with control to start position.

name: Band Rear-Delt Fly Horizontal Pull
description: Rowing pattern building back thickness and scapular control.
how_to: Hinge or set chest-supported position with neutral spine.
Drive elbows back to pull implement toward torso.
Squeeze shoulder blades, then lower with control.
Keep torso stable—avoid shrugging or momentum.

name: Band Face Pull
description: Rowing pattern building back thickness and scapular control.

name: Band Pulldown
description: Pulling pattern emphasizing lats with arm flexors assisting.
how_to: Set shoulders down and back to start.
Pull elbows down toward ribs to bring handle/bar to chest.
Pause briefly; control the return to full stretch.
Avoid craning neck or swinging.

name: Band Kickback Horizontal Press
description: Upper-body press emphasizing chest with triceps and shoulders assisting.
how_to: Set scapulae retracted and feet planted.
Lower implement under control with elbows ~45°.
Press back to lockout without flaring excessively.
Keep ribcage stacked over pelvis.

name: Band JM Press Horizontal Press
description: Upper-body press emphasizing chest with triceps and shoulders assisting.
how_to: Set scapulae retracted and feet planted.

Keep ribcage stacked over pelvis.

name: Band Farmer Carry Carry
description: Loaded carry training trunk stiffness, grip, and gait mechanics.
how_to: Pick weight safely and stand tall with ribs down.
Walk under control without sway; short quick steps.
Keep shoulders packed; avoid leaning.
Set weight down safely at end of distance.
